name: Flock
tagline: We are an agency of ideas
description:
Flock - Linked by Isobar is a full service integrated agency part of Dentsu Aegis Network since 2016.
Established in 2009, Flock has the purpose to create "Ideas Hacking Realities" by leveraging Brand Commerce strategies to deliver great stories for inspiration in order to maximize our clients transactions. Our goal is to help our clients win in the Digital Economy.
